title: Supported topologies
content:
Native SACM

When Native SACM is enabled, CI topologies are described in CI topology.

CMS integration through On-Premises Bridge (OPB)

When using OPB to integrate SMA and UD/UCMDB, Service Management supports the discovery of topologies by replicating the relationships within Service Management. Synchronization supports discovery of the topologies in the following table.

In each of the cases in the table, Service Management may create a SystemElement CI to match the requirements of the Service Management data model.
